name: WireTap Studio Library
summary: Learn about .WTPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: WTPL files are saved in a package format that includes both audio files and .PLIST files. Each audio file has a corresponding property list file that contains metadata about the corresponding file.

WireTap Studio creates a file named "WireTap Studio Library.wtpl" when run for the first time or if no playlist is found when the program is opened. It is saved in the [user]/â€‹Documents folder by default.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
